word:
"It is written in the prophets, And they shall be all taught of God. Every man therefore that hath heard, 
                                                                           488
and hath learned of the Father, cometh unto Me. . . . I am the living bread which came down from heaven: if any man eat of this bread, he shall live forever: and the bread that I will give is My flesh, which I will give for the life of the world."
